original_text: Behold, the nations are as a drop of a bucket, and are counted as the small dust of the balance: behold, he taketh up the isles as a very little thing.
korean_text: 보라 그에게는 열방이 통의 한 방울 물과 같고 저울의 작은 티끌 같으며 섬들은 떠오르는 먼지 같으리니

sentences.original_text: Behold, the nations are as a drop of a bucket
sentences.korean_translation: 보라, 민족들은 양동이의 한 방물과 같으며

sentences.original_text: and are counted as the small dust of the balance
behold, he taketh up the isles as a very little thing
sentences.korean_translation: 보라, 그가 섬들을 아주 작은 것으로 들어 올리시느라
